name: Arunima
wishText: In these pandemic times we've been able to understand each other more and get a lot of work done both personally and professionally. From our uncertain August 2020 to celebratory December 2020, enveloping episode of B99, bitching sessions, group studies, mock interviews, video calls, corona times and much more, we are able to understand why we truly love to hate each other. I hope we will continue to do the same.
